name: Sloth
description:
"Sloth becomes a sin when it slows down and even brings to a halt the energy we must expend in using the means to salvation."

The Seven Deadly Sins collectible 6/7

Collect one of each from the entire Seven deadly sins cards collection and i will giveaway ONE EXCLUSIVE CARD to that person.. There be only 3 giveaways. So hurry up ;)
